ParameterElements.Name: Id
ParameterElements.Label: HTML id
ParameterElements.HelpText: The programmatic ID of the <IFrame /> element. You can use this to access the IFrame using JavaScript. Default is 'no id'.

ParameterElements.Name: Height
ParameterElements.Label: HTML height
ParameterElements.HelpText: The value of the height attribute on the iframe element.

ParameterElements.Name: Class
ParameterElements.Label: HTML class
ParameterElements.HelpText: The CSS class (or classes) of the <iframe /> element. Default is 'no class'.

ParameterElements.Name: Src
ParameterElements.Label: URL to load
ParameterElements.HelpText: The src value for the iframe html tag.

ParameterElements.Name: Developer
ParameterElements.Label: Developer
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'False' (default), Disqus will not attempt to read the location of your page and validate the URL. 'False' is recommended when testing on an inaccessible website.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Bool.CheckBox" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param name="ItemLabel" value="Developer Mode" /></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: SiteShortname
ParameterElements.Label: Site Shortname
ParameterElements.HelpText: The site shortname of the website registered the Disqus comments.

ParameterElements.Name: SiteShortname
ParameterElements.Label: Site Shortname
ParameterElements.HelpText: The site shortname of the website registered the Disqus comments.

ParameterElements.Name: ShowAvatars
ParameterElements.Label: Show Avatars
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True' (default), avatars will be shown

ParameterElements.Name: ModeratorsRanking
ParameterElements.Label: Moderators Ranking
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True', it shows the moderators in ranking ('False' by default)

ParameterElements.Name: Mode
ParameterElements.Label: Mode
ParameterElements.HelpText: The information about the comments to be displayed: recent posts, popular threads, top commenters, or the combination thereof ('Recent' by default)
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Combination,Recent,Popular,Top" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ColorTheme
ParameterElements.Label: Color Theme
ParameterElements.HelpText: The color theme to use ('Blue' by default)
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Blue,Grey,Green,Red,Orange" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: Items
ParameterElements.Label: Items to display
ParameterElements.HelpText: The number of items to display (5 by default)

ParameterElements.Name: DefaultTabView
ParameterElements.Label: Default Tab View
ParameterElements.HelpText: The default tab view ('Recent' by default)
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="People,Recent,Popular" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ExcerptLength
ParameterElements.Label: Comment Excerpt Length
ParameterElements.HelpText: The length of the comment excerpt (200 by default)

ParameterElements.Name: AvatarSize
ParameterElements.Label: Avatar Size
ParameterElements.HelpText: The size of an avatar (48 by default)
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="24,32,48,92,128" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ButtonStyle
ParameterElements.Label: Button style
ParameterElements.HelpText: The style for the button. "ViewMy_160x33" by default.

ParameterElements.Name: ProfileUrl
ParameterElements.Label: Profile URL
ParameterElements.HelpText: A public profile URL

ParameterElements.Name: ButtonTitle
ParameterElements.Label: Button title
ParameterElements.HelpText: The tooltip text that pops up on hovering over the button. "View my profile on LinkedIn" by default
ParameterElements.DefaultValueFunctionMarkup: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Constant.String"><f:param name="Constant" value="View my profile on LinkedIn" /></f:function>

ParameterElements.Name: ColorScheme
ParameterElements.Label: Color Scheme
ParameterElements.HelpText: The color scheme for the plugin. Options: 'light', 'dark'. Default is 'light'.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="light,dark" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: AppID
ParameterElements.Label: Application ID
ParameterElements.HelpText: Your application ID as the admin, with which you can moderate all your plugins at http://developers.facebook.com/tools/comments

ParameterElements.Name: Width
ParameterElements.Label: Width
ParameterElements.HelpText: The width of the plugin, in pixels (500 by default). Recommended minimum: 400px.

ParameterElements.Name: ModeratorIDs
ParameterElements.Label: Moderator IDs
ParameterElements.HelpText: To moderate, you need to list yourself as an admin. Specify your Facebook user ID. To add multiple moderators, separate the IDs by comma without spaces.

ParameterElements.Name: URL
ParameterElements.Label: URL
ParameterElements.HelpText: The URL of the page with this Comments plugin. The News Feed stories on Facebook will link to this URL. If not specified, it defaults to the current page.

ParameterElements.Name: NumPosts
ParameterElements.Label: Number of posts
ParameterElements.HelpText: The number of comments to display (10 by default).

ParameterElements.Name: AccessToken
ParameterElements.Label: Access token
ParameterElements.HelpText: The Facebook App's access token

ParameterElements.Name: AlbumID
ParameterElements.Label: Album ID
ParameterElements.HelpText: The ID of a Facebook album with images to display.

ParameterElements.Name: Count
ParameterElements.Label: Count
ParameterElements.HelpText: Indicates whether or not to render an aggregate count. Default is 'true'.

ParameterElements.Name: URL
ParameterElements.Label: URL
ParameterElements.HelpText: The URL to be +1'd. The URL of current page by default.

ParameterElements.Name: Size
ParameterElements.Label: Size
ParameterElements.HelpText: The button size to load. Default is 'standard'
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="small,medium,standard,tall" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ShowFaces
ParameterElements.Label: Show faces
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True', profile pictures are displayed below the button (standard layout only). 'True' by default.

ParameterElements.Name: URL
ParameterElements.Label: URL to like
ParameterElements.HelpText: The URL to like. If not specified, it defaults to the current page.

ParameterElements.Name: Font
ParameterElements.Label: Font
ParameterElements.HelpText: The font used in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana' .
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="arial,lucida grande,segoe ui,tahoma,trebuchet ms,verdana" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: Width
ParameterElements.Label: Width
ParameterElements.HelpText: The width of the Like button, in pixels (450 by default).

ParameterElements.Name: LayoutStyle
ParameterElements.Label: Layout style
ParameterElements.HelpText: The size and amount of social context next to the button ('standard' by default). Options: "standard" - social text to the right of the button and friends' profile photos below, "button_count" - the total number of likes to the right of the button, "box_count" -the total number of likes above the button.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="standard,button_count,box_count" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ColorScheme
ParameterElements.Label: Color scheme
ParameterElements.HelpText: The color scheme for the Like button. Options: 'light', 'dark'. Default is 'light'.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="light,dark" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: SendButton
ParameterElements.Label: Send button
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True', the Send button is included along with the Like button ('True' by default).

ParameterElements.Name: VerbToDisplay
ParameterElements.Label: Verb to display
ParameterElements.HelpText: The verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend'. Default is 'like'.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="like,recommend" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ObjectUniqueID
ParameterElements.Label: Object unique ID
ParameterElements.HelpText: The unique ID of a Facebook public page or user account

ParameterElements.Name: AlbumTypes
ParameterElements.Label: Album types
ParameterElements.HelpText: One or more types of albums to show on a page: normal, wall, profile.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="normal,wall,profile" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ShowFacebookLinksToTheAlbum
ParameterElements.Label: Use Facebook links to albums
ParameterElements.HelpText: When 'true', albums will be opened externally on their dedicated Facebook pages; otherwise, on the current page ('false' by default)

ParameterElements.Name: AccessToken
ParameterElements.Label: Access token
ParameterElements.HelpText: The Facebook App's access token

ParameterElements.Name: AccessToken
ParameterElements.Label: Access token
ParameterElements.HelpText: The Facebook App's access token

ParameterElements.Name: AlbumTypes
ParameterElements.Label: Album types
ParameterElements.HelpText: One or more types of albums to show on a page: normal, wall, profile.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="normal,wall,profile" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ObjectUniqueID
ParameterElements.Label: Object unique ID
ParameterElements.HelpText: The unique ID of a Facebook public page or user account

ParameterElements.Name: UseFacebookLinksToAlbums
ParameterElements.Label: Use Facebook links to albums
ParameterElements.HelpText: When 'true', albums will be opened externally on their dedicated Facebook pages; otherwise, on the current page ('false' by default)

ParameterElements.Name: ListLength
ParameterElements.Label: RSS List Length
ParameterElements.HelpText: The number of items to include

ParameterElements.Name: RSSSource
ParameterElements.Label: RSS Source
ParameterElements.HelpText: The URL of the RSS feed

ParameterElements.Name: ProfileId
ParameterElements.Label: Profile Id
ParameterElements.HelpText: AddThis profile Id. Profiles allow publishers to organize and share AddThis analytics data with team members or clients.

ParameterElements.Name: Style
ParameterElements.Label: Select a Style
ParameterElements.HelpText: A visual style of the buttons.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Community.AddThis.GetOptionsXml" /></f:param><f:param name="KeyFieldName" value="Value" /><f:param name="LabelFieldName" value="Title" /><f:param name="Required" value="True" /><f:param name="Multiple" value="False" /><f:param name="Compact" value="False" /></f:widgetfunction>
